query: SELECT SUM(CAST(cash AS DECIMAL(10,2)) + CAST(network AS DECIMAL(10,2))) as total_revenue, COUNT(*) as days_count FROM dailyRevenues WHERE branchId = 1 AND date >= '2025-12-01'
